Parameters.description: Parameters for the EAT_ENTIRELY operation. Consumes all remaining servings from a food item, always resulting in a consumed state.

actorEntity.description: Entity ID of the actor eating the food item

foodEntity.description: Entity ID of the food item being consumed entirely

result_variable.description: Optional variable name to store the operation result. Result includes {success: boolean, error?: string, servingsConsumed: number, flavorText?: string}
